string.value: I entered #m261020401# without really thinking too much about it... As usual, #b#p2111006##k the talkative ghost starts up a conversation. I don't really want to listen to him go on and on about his life. What should I do?
When I asked about #p2111002#'s past that I saw through him in the past, Parwen's face lit up and showed me #p2111002# again. Hmmm... he looks like a bit of time has passed since I last saw him...

I tried to start up a conversation with an obviously tired #p2111002#. His face may have the look of exhaustion, but he managed to smile just a bit. He may have failed the experiment, but he said he has succeeded in creating a new medicine for #p2111005#...
Um... can I help you? I don't think we have ever met. You cannot just walk into a lab like that, but... I am in such a great mood today, that nothing really bothers me today. Haha...
Huh? You didn't meet with De Lang yet? What are you doing just standing around here then?
